catalog_info.title: Beginning German (Intensive)
catalog_info.notes: May not be taken Pass/Fail. Not open to auditors.
catalog_info.description: A complete first-year course in one term for students with no knowledge of German. Provides an introduction to German language and culture encompassing all four skills: speaking, listening, reading, and writing, as well as an introduction to the culture of the German-speaking countries. Class sessions emphasize the development of oral proficiency. Instruction is supplemented by literary and non-literary texts, videos, and Internet activities.
